name: Strawberry and Almond Smoothie
description: This smoothie is a meal in itself — yet avoids the protein additives and brewer’s yeast popular in the world of bodybuilding. This recipe uses almond powder and requires ripe, sweet strawberries. (Frozen strawberries will work fine.) Substitute other kinds of nuts or nut flour, or other kinds of fruit, at your discretion.
recipeCategory: breakfast, easy, quick, shakes and smoothies
keywords: almonds, buttermilk, strawberries, gluten-free, healthy, high fiber, low cholesterol, vegetarian, spring
recipeIngredient: 1 heaped cup (7 ounces / 200 grams) quartered hulled strawberries
1 tablespoon almond powder (also known as almond flour) or finely ground almonds (6 1/2 grams)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender, with ice cubes if desired, and blend at high speed until smooth.
